Sinopse: Unfortunately, Paolo and Diana are going through a rough patch in their relationship after five years of marriage. Diana, however, wants to live life to the fullest. And as her forbidden desires grow stronger by the day, Diana gives in to lust and embarks on a secret mission to find pleasure. As a result, Diana recounts her passionate sexual fantasies to her unaware husband to rekindle the fire in their uneventful marriage; now that she has discovered the joys of adultery, Diana is determined to spice up their dormant sexual life at all costs. But they say all is fair in love and war. Will things work out for Diana and Paolo in the end?—Nick Riganas
